languages.text: "Гемункулы способны сотворять собственные копии, оставляя в потаенных лабораториях частицы своего тела. Стоит гемункулу испустить дух..." {n}Маражай щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Полагаю, Тервантьяс не поделился с Иремерисс своим секретом".

traits.locale_text: "Гемункулы способны сотворять собственные копии, оставляя в потаенных лабораториях частицы своего тела. Стоит гемункулу испустить дух..." {n}Маражай щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Полагаю, Тервантьяс не поделился с Иремерисс своим секретом".

languages.text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "Гемункулы способны сотворять собственные копии, оставляя в потаенных лабораториях частицы своего тела. Стоит гемункулу испустить дух..." {n}Маражай щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Полагаю, Тервантьяс не поделился с Иремерисс своим секретом".

traits.locale_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret laboratories. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

"Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret laboratories. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

"Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

"Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

"Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

"Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

languages.text: “血伶人会在他们的秘密实验室中留下自己的身体组织样本，复制原来的自己。只要原本的自己咽了气……”{n}玛拉斋敲了敲手指。{/n}“我猜，特万提亚斯并没有把他这个小秘密告诉伊芮梅莉斯。”
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: “血伶人会在他们的秘密实验室中留下自己的身体组织样本，复制原来的自己。只要原本的自己咽了气……”{n}玛拉斋敲了敲手指。{/n}“我猜，特万提亚斯并没有把他这个小秘密告诉伊芮梅莉斯。”

languages.text: "Haemonculi können Kopien ihrer selbst erschaffen, indem sie Proben ihres Körpergewebes in geheimen Laboren zurücklassen. Sobald der Haemonculus seinen letzten Atemzug tut ..." {n}Marazhai schnippt mit den Fingern.{/n} "Tervantias hat sein Geheimnis wohl nicht mit Yremeryss geteilt."
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Haemonculi können Kopien ihrer selbst erschaffen, indem sie Proben ihres Körpergewebes in geheimen Laboren zurücklassen. Sobald der Haemonculus seinen letzten Atemzug tut ..." {n}Marazhai schnippt mit den Fingern.{/n} "Tervantias hat sein Geheimnis wohl nicht mit Yremeryss geteilt."

languages.text: «Los hemónculos pueden crear copias de sí mismos guardando muestras de sus tejidos corporales en laboratorios secretos. En cuanto un hemónculo exhala su último suspiro...». {n}Marazhai chasquea los dedos.{/n} «Imagino que Tervantias no compartió su secreto con Yremeryss».
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: «Los hemónculos pueden crear copias de sí mismos guardando muestras de sus tejidos corporales en laboratorios secretos. En cuanto un hemónculo exhala su último suspiro...». {n}Marazhai chasquea los dedos.{/n} «Imagino que Tervantias no compartió su secreto con Yremeryss».

languages.text: « Un hémoncule peut créer des copies de lui-même en laissant des échantillons de ses tissus dans des laboratoires secrets. Dès qu'il rend son dernier souffle... » {n}Marazhai claque des doigts.{/n} « J'imagine que Tervantias n'a pas confié son secret à Yremeryss. »
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: « Un hémoncule peut créer des copies de lui-même en laissant des échantillons de ses tissus dans des laboratoires secrets. Dès qu'il rend son dernier souffle... » {n}Marazhai claque des doigts.{/n} « J'imagine que Tervantias n'a pas confié son secret à Yremeryss. »

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスは秘密の研究所に自身の体の組織のサンプルを残して、奴ら自身のコピーを作成できるんだ。ハモンキュラスが息を引き取るとすぐにな…」{n}マラズハイが指を鳴らす。{/n}「テルヴァンティアスがイレメリスと秘密を共有したとは思えない」
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスは秘密の研究所に自身の体の組織のサンプルを残して、奴ら自身のコピーを作成できるんだ。ハモンキュラスが息を引き取るとすぐにな…」{n}マラズハイが指を鳴らす。{/n}「テルヴァンティアスがイレメリスと秘密を共有したとは思えない」

languages.text: "Haimonkuluslar, gizli laboratuvarlara bıraktıkları doku örneklerinden kendilerini kopyalayabilir. Bir Haimonkulus, son nefesini verdiği an..." {n}Marazhai, parmaklarını şıklatıyor.{/n} "Tervantias, sırrını Yremeryss'le paylaşmamış sanırsam."
languages.original_text: "Haemonculi can create copies of themselves by leaving samples of their body tissues in secret labs. As soon as a Haemonculus breathes their last..." {n}Marazhai clicks his fingers.{/n} "I don't suppose Tervantias shared his secret with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Haimonkuluslar, gizli laboratuvarlara bıraktıkları doku örneklerinden kendilerini kopyalayabilir. Bir Haimonkulus, son nefesini verdiği an..." {n}Marazhai, parmaklarını şıklatıyor.{/n} "Tervantias, sırrını Yremeryss'le paylaşmamış sanırsam."
